abstract: Michael F. Price’s MFP Investors is shorting Citigroup and Wachovia, as the value investment firm feels that neither bank is done suffering pain.
snippet: Michael F. Price’s MFP Investors is shorting Citigroup and Wachovia, as the value investment firm feels that neither bank is done suffering pain.
lead_paragraph: Michael F. Price made his name and billions as a value investor, snapping up besieged stocks. Yet even he thinks that the pain that banks are feeling is far from over.

headline.main: Price Says He’s Shorting Citi, Wachovia
